sense.def: Illness Sign identical with chen zhong 沉重① . Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 4: 凡男女因積勞虛損，或大病 後不復，常若四體沉滯，骨肉疼酸 , “Whenever males or females have been affected by accumulation exhaustion and depletion injury, or when after a massive disease episode they have not recovered yet, they often experience a feeling as if there were a deep-seated heaviness in their four extremities, and bones and flesh have sensations of pain and soreness”.
